feels.name: Trust
feels.quote: He's my child, and I can't have his spirit broken by harshness.

feels.name: Surprise
feels.quote: I never need fear that John will be too harsh with my babies: he does know how to manage them.

feels.name: Joy
feels.quote: Home grew home-like again, and John had no wish to leave it, unless he took Meg with him.

feels.name: Anticipation
feels.quote: I want to try it for your sake as much as for mine, because I've neglected you shamefully lately, and I'm going to make home what it used to be, if I can.

feels.name: Admiration
feels.quote: It's a love of a bonnet, but I prefer the face inside, for it looks young and happy again.

feels.name: Contentment
feels.quote: This household happiness did not come all at once, but John and Meg had found the key to it.

feels.name: Satisfaction
feels.quote: I really don't see what we are coming to.

Places.name: Nursery
Places.description: Where Demi is put to bed and managed by John and Meg.

Places.name: Home
Places.description: Where the household happiness is achieved through changes made by John and Meg.
